locid:1.name: Magicia City streets
locid:1.notes: A guard at every corner and a sorcerer every five feet. The stores are all about potions and magic, the library is huge and your coin purse is sure to be lighter by the end of the day.

locid:2.name: Weapons and Potions shop
locid:2.alignment: Chaotic Money (they'll do ANYTHING for your money except kill/rob you, you hope)
locid:2.inventory: All manner of weaponry, along with literally hundreds of varieties of potions for your likeing.

locid:4.name: Forest's Respite Lower Levels
locid:4.notes: The trees tower around you, and the bandits brandish their weapons along with their smiles. You should probably keep your weapon ready, it looks like it will be a fight before you can enter the Respite!
